text: Mark off the width and height of the picture, and the main proportions of Gohan’s figure. Draw his head and a centre line.
Add guidelines for the arms, feet, and proportions of Gohan’s face.
Draw the shapes of the trousers, belt, and hands, as well as his eyes, ear, and nose. With smooth lines, show the general shape of his hair.
Sketch Gohan’s hands, eyebrows, shoes, and the neck of his tunic. Draw his hair locks in detail.
Draw Gohan’s hair, eye pupils, and fingers. Detail the shapes of his clothes.
Work on the whole figure, paying special attention to the details.
Contour Gohan, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Refine the details and add the ground. Erase all the guidelines.
